definition: Badong county in Enshi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 恩施土家族苗族自治州[En1 shi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Hubei
Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
surname Dong
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
Badong county in Enshi Tujia and Miao autonomous prefecture 恩施土家族苗族自治州[En1 shi1 Tu3 jia1 zu2 Miao2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Hubei

sentences.english: But given Padang's location, the much greater danger is tsunamis.
sentences.chinese: 因巴东的地理位置，更容易受海啸的侵袭。

sentences.english: Officials in Badong have promised Deng a fair hearing.
sentences.chinese: 巴东的官员承诺给邓玉娇一个公正的审判。

sentences.english: The spatial pattern of Manglietia patungensis was a clumped distribution.
sentences.chinese: 巴东木莲在群落中呈聚集分布格局。

sentences.english: I Badong county party secretary Chen row A.
sentences.chinese: 我是巴东县委书记陈行甲。

sentences.english: But these leaves have a distinctive aroma which is the soul of rendang.
sentences.chinese: 这些叶有特殊的香味，是巴东味道的灵魂。

sentences.english: But people in Padang now know that means there will be a tsunami," said Natawidjaja. (Editing by  Sara Webb and Megan Goldin)
sentences.chinese: 但巴东人现在知道那是海啸的前兆。

sentences.english: There were people who gathered at the gate of Court of Badong County from the early morning 7:oo.
sentences.chinese: 从早晨7时许，巴东县法院门口就开始有人群聚集。

sentences.english: Houzibao dangerous rock is situated at Huoyanshi village in Badong County on the right bank of Yangtse Rive.
sentences.chinese: 猴子包危岩体位于巴东县信陵镇火焰石村长江右岸。
